column4: Hi all - I'm running Windows 7 which is pretty much a piece of shit. Can I install Ubuntu by double clicking some Ubuntu icon so I can get rid of Winshit?
keep the language PG or be kicked
Please refrain from further attempts at threatening me or you may force me to call my lawyer regarding such harassment.
if you want rid of win7 you can boot to livecd and remove the win7 install to install ubuntu on 100% of the space available. This will destroy all currnt data
